hits.name: Apple - $10 iTunes Gift Cards (3-Pack) - Pink
hits.description: iTunes Gift Cards are perfect for anyone who enjoys one-stop entertainment. Each card features an iTunes Store code redeemable for music, movies, TV shows, games, apps, and more. Recipients can access content on an iPod, iPad or iPhone, Mac, or PC.

hits.name: Apple - 29W USB-C Power Adapter - White
